ratings.comment: The class was 604 not 365. Alex is an excellent professor, although he talks a lot. However, the content is interesting and a lot of the content he has done his own research on/written papers about. It is a VERY participation based class and if you participate it will be engaging and super easy. He is very lenient and not too many assignments.
Engaging lecturer, makes subject matter relevant.  A lot of reading. Make sure you're using material from the readings in your papers.

Amazing teacher. Interesting, inspirational, clearly passionate about what he teaches and funny. Doesn't show up just to read his slides, he really delivers his knowledge and tries to make sure we all participate. Definitely my favorite teacher/course at UW-Madison !
He was the best professor I've ever had and I would highly recommend this class! His lectures are amazing and the class is really applicable to the business world.
An amazing teacher. Best class I have taken in 4 years at Madison. Perfect class to end a college career
THE best teacher I've had. He's incredibly smart, funny, and helpful. The class (Leadership) is really interesting and applicable. Alex is awesome.
Great professor! The best class I took in the business school! Highly recommend to take this class
